scripts.test:install: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml run --no-deps test yarn --no-progress
scripts.test:ci: yarn test:install && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml run test-ci yarn test
scripts.test: yarn test:install && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml run test yarn test
